summary: In Tuscany to promote his latest book, a middle-aged British writer meets a French woman who leads him to the village of Lucignano. While there, a chance question reveals something deeper.
cast: Juliette Binoche|William Shimell|Jean-Claude Carrière|Agathe Natanson|Gianna Giachetti|Adrian Moore|Angelo Barbagallo|Andrea Laurenzi|Filippo Trojano|Manuela Balsimelli
title: Copia certificada
